title: PROJECT: Yi in-game voice is still very low
body:
This bug has been happening to me since some patches ago and I've seen no one mention it. 
The skin's voice in-game is very low and can barely be heard. All the other champion's voices are okay. My in-game sounds are all ok so it's not a problem on my end.
I would like someone from Riot to shed some light into this, because it would be a shame to have wasted 1820 RP on this skin, and not be able to hear the voiceover.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=LostFr0st,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=itEkdrub,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-03-03T00:14:23.067+0000)
>
> From another post: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/VGdhEKVG-project-yis-in-game-voice-is-at-a-whisper-in-volume?comment=0001

Thanks, I didn't realize this was posted before. I hope this get's fixed soon.
Yup! We're still in the process of resolving this, but we haven't forgotten! :]
I thought it was only me! Can confirm this, it's very annoying
